cause.description:
A home for people who are dyin of cancer.... making moments matter
Lissard House provides an environment that focuses on living each day to its fullest
Death is aknowledged as the accepted outcome of life for us all and not a demon to be faught against
Patients and their families set the daily pace, celebrate special occations, and control the final days. The hospice location offers privacy, quite, peace and tranquility in a natural setting.
Lisaard House is a hospice which provides care at no cost for individuals who are dying of cancer. It is a comfortable home-like setting situated on a beautiful treed lot. It is anticipated that a resident may need the services of Lisaard House for approximately three months.
1. make moments matter
2. focus on living each day to its fullest
3. death is not a demon to be faught against
cause.mission: provide an environment where the focus is on living each day to its fullest
cause.name: Lisaard House
